title: Thursday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
Starting today, ALT★HERO: Q will be on hiatus until Issue #5 is complete, and is being replaced with WARMAN by Chuck Dixon.

WARMAN Episode 1: Guns and Money

A THRONE OF BONES Episode 49: Blade Dancer

STONETOSS Episode 86: Filthy Rich

VEGFOLK FABLES Episode 83: The Supplicant

CHUCK DIXON PRESENTS: ADVENTURE Episode 42: The Case of the Third Hand
